price: (Firavun), Kıyamet günü halkına öncülük eder. Onları ateşe götürür. Gittikleri yer ne kötü yerdir.
arabic: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yaqdumu qawmahu yawma al-qiyāmati fa-awradahumu al-nāra wabi'sa al-wir'du al-mawrūdu
